title: Purple Folders
content:
Support It seems a number of my file folders are corrupted. They show up as purple instead of the normal B&W. I say they are corrupted because, though I can still see them, as well as still put emails in and access the one in the folder, I lose the ability to do things specifically with the folders themselves. I'm attaching two screen shots

  1. 1 shows the normal folder.
  2. 2 shows the "Purple Folder" for comparison to normal.

On examination you can see some capabilities are not avaiable, i.e. DELETE, RENAME ect What causes this ? How can these "Purple Folder" be fixed? tx tom

Thomas J Meehan CAPTTJM@HOTMAIL.COM
creator: capttjm

title: Folder tabs restored at startup have lost the folders
content: I just upgraded to v115 and the tabs I have open when closing TB are restored but all are the first folder in my folder bar. The folders I had open in those tabs are lost. The first few times it opened the folder at the top of my folder bar in all the tabs, now it opened that folder in the first tabs and the other tabs are completely blank. Is there a way to fix this please?
creator: firefox.com1

title: Email setting
content:
Why do my attachments after a while have a crossed outline through the attachment icon? and can not download anymore. Is this a setting that I need to adjust?

Please see pic.
creator: bnedic22

title: password
content: Hi, thunderbird is asking for new password. I have not changed any passwords and no password I have works. what do I do? thanks Sharon Lock
creator: sharon.lock

title: My Unread Folders frequently show unread messages when there aren't any unread messages
content: Unread Folders is unreliable. It frequently shows that there are unread messages in a folder within Local Folders but upon opening the folder, there are no messages in any of the folders under it. And when compared with the actual Local Folders view, it doesn't show any unread messages either.
creator: gmkayaker

title: installation problem
content: Older version: Cannot download email beyond "sending login information" I donated but upgraded and new Beta version does give access to my email and folders
creator: vvuurenr

title: Running two identical IMAP profiles
content:
I am running Thunderbird on my PC, with two accounts, both on IMAP mail.

I want to run Thunderbird on my laptop as well, with exactly the same interface and accounts.

Can I copy the profile and ini from my PC to my laptop? Will this work?
creator: louisesjpp

title: INSTALAR THUNDERBIRD EN SEGUNDO PC
content: Buenos días, Tengo el THUNDERBIRD instalado en mi PC con varias cuentas y ahora quiero instalarlo en nuestro nuevo servidor para poder operar desde ahí. Me dejo instalar el programa sin problema pero al intentar sincronizar las cuentas me dice que no encuentra mi servidor de mail. La configuración creo que está exactamente igual en ambos programas pero en la segunda configuración no sincroniza con el servidor de email. Gracias por anticipado. Saludos
creator: bionarcis

title: Blank Mail Tab
content:
Hi! The Mail Tab appears blank. Thunderbird is downloading new mails in the background but nothing is showing. The middle column showing maximized. Resizing the middle column just show blank spaces either side. reinstall does not work. unified folders works different. the Inbox folder do not show unified incoming mails as before!.

When using troubleshoot mode without disabling add-ons nor resetting toolbars & controls, it works normally

ideas?
creator: juliandesign

title: Thunderbird attachments don't open sometimes
content:
Every once in a while message attachments wont open. A temporaty fix is to fix the incoming folder but that takes a long time every time i have to do that.

This time i decided to check the error log and found this error:

NS_BASE_STREAM_CLOSED: Component returned failure code: 0x80470002 (NS_BASE_STREAM_CLOSED) [nsIInputStream.available] NetUtil.sys.mjs:445 

   readInputStream resource://gre/modules/NetUtil.sys.mjs:445    buffer resource:///modules/AttachmentInfo.sys.mjs:215    onStopRequest resource://gre/modules/NetUtil.sys.mjs:124
creator: fkikkas

title: My Thunderbird eats my disc space
content:
Hi, I've noticed that my imac starts to run slowly if Thunderbird is active. Watching the disk space in Commander One, I can visually see the disk space melting away. If I close Thunderbird, it stops.

Why is this happening? Do you have any solution to this problem? TIA
creator: rcs4

title: Non junk emails going into junk folder
content: I have set up a new laptops a few month back and since then, I am having issues with some emails from my contacts going into the junk folder. Last night one of my client who I have been emailing all week ended up into the junk folder and I can't understand how. My provider is 123 Reg and I have checked with them and there are no issues on their side. I tried to unistall Thunderbird from my PC and download it again thinking that would delete and setting but when I reinstall it, it's already all set up. Any help/tip would be greatly appreciated. Thank you
creator: jlemmers

title: The old PDF Inline issue ;o)
content:
Hi ALL,

First off, once again, thank you very much for the best email application in the world.

Just to make sure, does the latest version of Thunderbird not support showing PDF in line anymore? I did check the settings of attachments to show and I did reactivate the view menu show attachments in line but still no joy.

Thanks a million for any help.

title: Enviar e-mails para uma lista de contatos, com pausa entre cada contato
content: Olá bom dia. Gostaria de uma ajuda. Quero enviar um e-mail para uma lista de contatos. Porém gostaria que quando enviar e-mail para um contato, aguarde um tempo, que eu informe. Isso é possível ???

title: E-Mail Metin Ayarları
content: Merhabalar, Mail yazarken satır araları çok boşluk kalıyor. bu durumu nasıl çözebilirim ?
creator: tasarim

title: Can receive emails in TB but can not send
content:
We have two IMAP email accounts which use smtp.outlook365.com to send emails via Thunderbird 115.7.0 One account stopped being able to send about six months ago but I could not resolve the problem with either your help pages or by comparing with account settings with the address which could send emails successfully. This week the second account can not send emails either. Both accounts receive all incoming emails. We have Kaspersky VPN and have switched this off without it making any difference.

Our smtp settings are:- smtp.office365.com port 587 STARTTLS Normal password (I have tried OAuth2 and No authentication but none helped) user.name@outlook.com

The error message on sending says :- Sending of the message failed. The message could not be sent because the connection to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.office365.com timed out. Try again.

Any help would be appreciated.
creator: BlueMoss75

title: All mails downloaded on initial mail account set up
content:
I have installed TB on a new device and want to set up my mail accounts with only the last 3 months mail for each one.

I understand the IMAP account settings for "Synchronization & Storage" & "Disk Space" where indeed you can set the download by size or time.

The problem is that those settings are only accessible once the mail account is set up.

The mail account set up itself initiates the download of all mail from the server the instant the account is set up which is then not adjustable until after that initial download is complete. 

i.e. there appears to be no way to stop the entire mailbox from the server being downloaded.

Does anyone know a way to time limit that initial download or indeed prevent any initial download until the account settings can be used to do so?
creator: adrianbates
